messages.content: As a resident of Central Croydon and a year 13 student hoping to go on to study politics at university next year, Gavin Barwell, our MP, was generous enough to grant me work experience with him during the summer.

issues.education: raising the standards in local schools
issues.socialWelfare: tackling the areas in our town which most need improving

leaflet.personalStatement: I personally think Gavin is a good MP because he is extremely active and hard-working in regards to all issues, large or small. The valuable time I spent with Gavin and his assistants taught me a great deal about local politics but showed me that Gavin is an extremely fair person who I think is the best choice to be MP for a place as diverse as Croydon, especially considering his work towards eliminating discrimination of all kinds.

contactInformation.address: Printed and promoted by Ian Parker on behalf of Gavin Barwell both at 36 Brighton Road, Purley, CR8 2LG

images.caption: Letter endorsing Gavin Barwell by Ella Hallums
